Title: Savage Orruk Morboys
Legend: Roaring unintelligible war cries, the Morboys are amongst a warclan’s deadliest warriors. Each possesses a deep connection to the wild spirit of Gorkamorka, growing stronger and more manic as monstrous foes are slain around them.
Intro: Each model in a Savage Orruk Morboys unit is armed with a Chompa and Toof Shiv.

Rules.Name: Battalions
Rules.Rule: BATTALIONS: This warscroll can be used in the following warscroll battalions: • Kop Rukk • Da Snorter’s Kop Rukk

Rules.Name: Champion
Rules.Rule: CHAMPION: 1 model in this unit can be a Savage Morboy Boss. Add 1 to the Attacks characteristic of that model’s melee weapons.

Rules.Name: Standard Bearer
Rules.Rule: STANDARD BEARER: 1 in every 10 models in this unit can be a Bone Totem Bearer. Add 1 to the Bravery characteristic of a unit that includes any Bone Totem Bearers.

Rules.Name: Musician
Rules.Rule: MUSICIAN: 1 in every 10 models in this unit can be a Skull Thumper. You can add 1 to charge rolls for a unit that includes any Skull Thumpers.

Rules.Name: Morboy Fury
Rules.Fluff: When Morboys charge into battle, things start to get crazy! Waaagh!
Rules.Rule: Add 1 to the Attacks characteristic of this unit’s melee weapons if this unit made a charge move in the same turn.
